alert.note: Alert for Cobb; North Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 4:54AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Cobb and central Fulton Counties through 530 AM EST... At 454 AM EST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a line of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Fair Oaks to Six Flags Over Georgia, and moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and increased chance of a brief tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...While winds should result in minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects, the leading edge of this line of storms has also exhibited areas of localized rotation. A brief tornado could quickly form. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Marietta, City of South Fulton, Sandy Springs, Roswell, Smyrna, Dunwoody, Fair Oaks, Midtown, North Atlanta, North Druid Hills, Mount Bethel, White Water Park, Virginia Highland, Vinings, Piedmont Park, Bankhead, Six Flags Over Georgia, Bolton and Dobbins Air Reserve Base. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately.
